question: There are a few people who say that our Nabi, Sall-Allahu alayhi wa sallam, was not human.
answer:
QUESTION

They also quote a hadith in favor of their claim. They usethis as a pretext to some other distorted beliefs that they have inherited fromtheir predecessors. I acknowledge the gravity of this issue, however being aMuslim we must know how was our beloved nabi different from us in terms ofhis physical presence. Jazakum Allah khair.

ANSWER


Share:

In terms of physical presence, Rasulullah, Sall-Allahu alayhi wa sallam, as well as all the other prophets, Alayhim salam, were the children of Adam, Alayhi salam, who was created from clay.

By Mufti Ebrahim Desai
